intro: Echidnium, commonly known as the red spider lily, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It belongs to the Amaryllidaceae family and is characterized by its striking red, spider-like flowers that bloom in spring. The plant has strap-shaped, evergreen leaves that remain throughout the year. It thrives in well-drained soil and requires full sun to partial shade for optimal growth. Echidnium is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to care for in suitable climates.
